PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-05332021-06-10,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TBS
ActPublic Service Superannuation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Public Service Superannuation Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the PUBLIC SERVICE SUPERANNUATION REGULATIONS in order to (1) align the Regulations with the Canada Labour Code and the Employment Insurance Act; (2) keep pace with the recognition of new types and durations of leave in terms and conditions of employment and collective agreements; and (3) alleviate the gendered impact of the present policy.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0136 Publication Date: 2021-06-23
AttachmentsAttachment
